intent_atoms.description: Expand the Tests/ISOInspectorAppTests/FoundationUI/ test suite to provide comprehensive FoundationUI component test coverage for iOS and macOS platforms.
Comprehensive test coverage of at least 80% for core FoundationUI components (Badge, Card, KeyValueRow, Button, TextField).
Snapshot tests implemented for visual regression detection across iOS and macOS.
Platform-specific test variants covering iOS 17+, macOS 14+ and relevant device sizes (iPad Pro 12.9", 11").
All tests pass locally with swift test, showing zero failures and snapshot diffs match expectations.
CI integration ready: tests integrated into GitHub Actions workflow if applicable.
Updated DOCS/INPROGRESS/next_tasks.md marking I0.2 as completed and I0.3 as next priority.
FoundationUI must be added to SwiftPM dependencies (I0.1 complete).
Use SwiftUI .snapshot() testing framework for snapshot tests.
Lock snapshot baseline to specific Xcode version in CI config.
Parallelize snapshot generation across test targets.
